caption.p: The blueGel electrophoresis chamber: blueGel (A) allows visualization of a 15 ml agarose gel using an integrated blue LED array. B) Agarose gel electrophoresis of Ebola virus amplification products of different sizes using the miniPCR thermocycler and blueGel electrophoretic chamber: 91 bp (lane 1), 131 bp (lane 2), 167 bp (lane 3), 239 bp (lane 4), 300 bp (lane 5), multiplex amplification of 91and 167 bp (lane 6), and negative control (lane 7).
